title: BRIEF-American Public Education-Voluntary Early Retirement Program To Result In Reduction Of 48 Employees
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:35 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-American Public Education-Voluntary Early Retirement Program To Result In Reduction Of 48 Employees Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - American Public Education Inc: * AMERICAN PUBLIC EDUCATION-VOLUNTARY EARLY RETIREMENT PROGRAM TO RESULT IN REDUCTION OF 48 EMPLOYEES, ABOUT 5% OF ITS NON-FACULTY WORKFORCE IN APEI DIVIDEND * AMERICAN PUBLIC EDUCATION SAYS COMPANY COMMITTED TO WORKFORCE REDUCTION PLAN ON MARCH 12, 2018 - SEC FILING * AMERICAN PUBLIC EDUCATION - ‍ ESTIMATES THAT WILL INCUR ABOUT $1.7 MILLION OF PRE-TAX CASH EXPENSES ASSOCIATED WITH EMPLOYEE SEVERANCE BENEFITS IN Q1 2018​ Source text ( bit.ly/2DznDqN ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
